item.description: üëã Hey y’all, welcome to the start of my homelab (or, the latest iteration of it). I’m documenting my homelab setup as a helpful guide for others to learn, detailing some of the annoying issues I encountered and some of the duct tape solutions. These are also backup instructions for when I inevitably scrap this homelab, rebuild, and forget how I did everything. This series will be centered around the setup and automation of a Promox cluster comprised of three very different machines.
